title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large pan, cook the pancetta until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Quickly add the hot pasta to the pan with pancetta, then pour over the egg and cheese mixture, stirring constantly.
Add some reserved pasta water if needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, red chili powder, 1 tsp garam masala, and ginger paste for 2 hours.
Grill or bake the marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, melt butter and saut√© onions until golden brown.

Stir in tomato puree, remaining garam masala, and salt. Simmer for 10 minutes.

Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with naan bread or rice.
